entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to a few rain showers or wet flurries this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or wet flurries changing to a few flurries this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 6. POP 30%
